LanguageData.PF_InspectorHover: If enabled, the path cost inspector window will appear while Control+Shift+Q is held. The movement costs inspector will appear while Control+Shift+E is held.
LanguageData.PF_DebugLogHover: Display additional messages in the log. Useful for debugging bugs.
LanguageData.PF_ResetSettingsHover: Reset all options of the mod to their default values.
